§e§lPassive: §c§lBloodlust§r - Grants 5 seconds of §oregeneration§r on every kill.
§e§lActive: §c§lBerserk§r - Right-click to gain §oswiftness§r, §ostrength§r, and §oresistance§r for 5 seconds.
